text: If you're talking about me behind my back that just means my life is obviously more interesting than yours.
It's funny how a person who was once just a stranger suddenly mean the world to you.
Relationships are meant for two people. If someone has something to say, ignore it. Alls that matters is that you're happy.
Don't believe the guy who only tells you he loves you, but believe the guy who shows you he does.
The best kind of relationship is when they're not only your lover, but your best friend too.
Some people just don't know what they have until it's gone.
A best friend knows you're sad. A best friend knows you're mad. A best friend knows you're crying. A best friend knows you're lying.
I don't regret and I don't stress, I put it behind me and move forward. The past is the past and I can't control it.
Don't force things to happen, just allow them to happen.
If you don't do stupid things while you're young, you'll have nothing to smile about when you're old.
It's crazy how you can get hurt so bad from the person you never expected it from.
Worry ends when faith begins.
I can make everyone believe that I don't love you. But I find it so difficult to convince myself that it's true.
It takes a strong person to forgive, but it takes an even stronger person to forget.
I wish I could forget you just as easily as you forgot me.
My life isn't perfect, but I'm thankful for everything I have.
You know life is worth the struggle when you look back on what you lost and realize that what you have now is much more greater.
I feel really happy when I see you, because when I look at you and see your smile, it also makes me have a smile.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
Pushing people away is like letting go of a boomerang. It hurts someone and comes back to hurt you, too.
Everybody deserves second chances, but not for the same mistakes.
I instantly smile when I see a text from you, I don't even care what's in it. It's just amazing to know I crossed your mind for a second.
It's great to be happy, but it's even better to bring happiness to others.
Sometimes, two people have to fall apart to realize how much they need to fall back together.
